charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking back to
town and ran into Blue, who was in the middle
of a series of battles with other Trainers.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_0200_:
Props for challenging me, guys. But today just
wasn’t your lucky day.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_0300_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Were you
watching me battle just now?
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_0401_0500_:
You don’t have to be so dramatic. But thanks,
I guess!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_0402_0700_:
I bet it was. Had to give ’em a little taste of what
I can really do, know what I mean?
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_0800_:
Hey, wanna know my secret to getting stronger?
I bet you’d catch on pretty quick.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_0900_:
First, you have to remember why you became a
Trainer in the first place. Don’t ever forget that.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_1000_:
Also, a sync pair is only as strong as their bond,
so you have to trust your partner—and earn their
love and trust, too.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_1100_: And last but not least, you need a good rival!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_1200_:
Red and I have been rivals for ages, so we’re
both where we are now because of each other.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_1300_:
Red’s the best at what he does. So as his rival, I
have to be the best, too.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_0401_1600_:
Heh, you must already have a pretty good rival of
your own, then.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_0402_1800_:
That just means you haven’t found a good rival
yet. I’m sure if you look around, you’ll find a ton
of candidates, though!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2000_:
As far as I can tell, you didn’t really pay that
much attention to anyone but yourself back then.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2200_:
And weren’t you the one who got too cocky and
said “I am the most powerful Trainer in the
world!” when you were Champion?
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2300_:
Er...I mean, I guess I might’ve said something
along those lines...
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2400_:
But I lost to Red soon after, and that’s when I
realized I had to change.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2600_:
And you know, I think Aerodactyl can keep up
with your tough training because he feels that you
love and trust him a lot!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2700_: Heh... I sure hope he does!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2800_:
I actually wanted to explore more of Kanto
together with Aerodactyl, but I kind of struggled
raising him back then.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_2900_:
I think it’s probably because I wasn’t ready to
handle him at the time.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3000_:
But now, I think I am! And that’s why I chose him
as my partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3100_:
I also chose this outfit because I want to
remember how I felt back then.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3200_:
Oh, but don’t worry... I don’t plan on
losing this time.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3300_:
I’m gonna reclaim my title of world’s strongest
Trainer together with Aerodactyl! Anyone who
disagrees can step right up and challenge us!
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3400_:
Well, I don’t plan on losing to you, either!
And also...
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3500_: Heh... You’re looking pretty confident, too.
charaepi_ch0021_80_green/2301_1201_3600_:
Perfect! Let’s have a battle! I’ll take you all down
at once!
